lessons.title: What is SDET?
lessons.excerpt: Understanding the role and responsibilities of a Software Development Engineer in Test

children.text: A Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) is a professional who combines software development skills with testing expertise to ensure high-quality software products.

lessons.title: SDET vs QA Engineer
lessons.excerpt: Key differences between SDET and traditional QA roles

children.text: While both roles focus on quality, SDETs have stronger programming skills and focus more on test automation and tooling development.
